comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Could be this one: Mary Noxon Sanders (1876-1958), daughter of Charles W. Sanders and Ella Adelia Wickwire of New York, Vassar College class president (1896), married William Henry Hays (Columbia, 1896) on 19 October 1898; she had at least three children (Ethel, William, and Grace). Between college and marriage, she taught at a "Miss Whiton and Miss Bangs' School" in New York. books.google.com/books?id=eb3OAAAAMAAJ&lpg=PA147&...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: It looks probable that this is Mary Noxon Sanders who married Wiliam Henry Hays.  We will add the information to the description with "probably"  until we get a confirming photograph of her.
